name: Anarchy Online

task.description: Running Anarchy Online Installer. Please do not run the game until this script finishes installing.
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- AO_installer: http://update.anarchy-online.com/download/AO/AnarchyOnline_EP2.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Funcom/Anarchy Online/AnarchyOnline.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Running Anarchy Online Installer. Please do not run the game until
      this script finishes installing.
    executable: AO_installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_43 d3dx9
    description: Installing dependencies
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
